description.en: Bfic Protocol is a decentralized network that allows anyone to invoice a payment for which the recipient can pay in a secure way. All the information is stored in a decentralized authentic ledger, this results in cheaper, easier, and more secure payments along with it allows for a wide range of automation possibilities.
